allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Prepare MailMood v1.0.0 for Chrome Web Store submission

- Bundle full analyzer + rewrite engine into extension \(no localhost dependency\)
- Remove unused permissions: activeTab, scripting
- Remove Outlook host permissions \(Gmail-only for v1.0\)
- Remove options page \(vestigial now that API is bundled\)
- Fix manifest paths and remove type:module from service worker
- Fix npm run build to use esbuild bundler instead of tsc
- Add Content Security Policy to manifest
- Add concurrency rate limiting \(MAX_CONCURRENT=5\) to inbox watcher
- Bump version to 1.0.0
- Remove Firefox browser_specific_settings

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
